tool_description:
Search french cities/regions/departments by name with the parameter "query". 

The API return also geo data latitude/longitude for cities.
name: FrenchCityRegion
title: FrenchCityRegion

api_list.name: search
api_list.description:
Retreive french cities/departments/regions base on the "query" parameter.

By default, the first result you get is the perfect match.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Examples values:
- Paris
- Bretagne
- Rennes

It's can be a city name, department name or region name.

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description:
Specify max result, 1 to 10.

By default, the value is **10**.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Filter results by type.

type values accepted :
- all
- city
- region
- department

By default, the value is **all**.
